definition: "piece of wood" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 90), mirror image of 片[pian4]
"piece of wood" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 90), mirror image of 片[pian4]

sentences.english: It was decided that the two businesses should be merged .
sentences.chinese: 人们决定应把这两丬商店合并起来。

sentences.english: The store is just a footstep away.
The proprietor of the store was formerly a farmer.
sentences.chinese: 这丬商店的老板原是一个农民。

definition: radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 4)/see 撇[pie3]
"fire" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 86), occurring in 熙, 然, 熊 etc
numeral 4 in Suzhou numeral system 蘇州碼子|苏州码子[Su1 zhou1 ma3 zi5]
numeral 2 in Suzhou numeral system 蘇州碼子|苏州码子[Su1 zhou1 ma3 zi5]
"eight" component in Chinese characters/archaic variant of 八[ba1]
one of the characters used in kwukyel, an ancient Korean writing system
one of the characters used in kwukyel (phonetic "ra"), an ancient Korean writing system
